revision.text:
{{Infobox Berry |name = #18 Guaya (Aguav) |image = [[File:Aguav.png]] |caption = La parte cercana al tallo es un poco amarga. Su delicada flor no necesita mucha luz. |growtime = 5m 50s |harvest = 17 bayas |replant = 30% |mutation = 0.6% |points = 55 |flavor =
*0 picante *0 seco *0 dulce *15 amargo *0 ácido }} '''Guaya (Aguav)''' es un tipo de [[Berries|baya]] que puede ser plantada en la [[Farm|granja]]. Se puede obtener rodeando una parcela con al menos de 25 y no más de 80 puntos amargos y menos de 5 puntos de cualquier otro sabor. Se requiere haber desbloqueado la baya [[Rawst|Safre (Rawst)]] para desbloquear esta baya. == Tablas de Crecimiento == === Estados de Crecimiento === {| class="wikitable" | style = "image-rendering: pixelated" ! !! Brote !! Crecimiento !! Floración !! Madurez |- ! Tiempo pasado desde que se planta | 40 seg || 2 min 50 seg || 3 min 40 seg || 5 min 50 seg - 11 min 40 seg |- ! Animación |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:AguavTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:AguavTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:AguavTreeBerry.png|50px]] |} === Tiempos de Maduración con modificadores=== {| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" ! Modificador !! Tiempo hasta la madurez-marchitado |- ! Ninguno | 5 min 50 seg -
11 min 40 seg |- ! Psydugadera | 3 min 53 seg -
7 min 47 seg |} == Diagrama de Flujo == [[File:Aguav_Flow_Chart.png|100px]]
'''Leyenda:'''
· Random Drop: Obtenido aleatoriamente en ruta
== Mutation Strategy == === Possible Planting Formations ===
You can fill your farm in the following way to obtain Aguav berries. Purple squares indicate where mutations can occur.
{| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Base Formation |- style="height: 50px;" | style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Rawst.png|30px]] [[Rawst]] |- style="height: 50px;" | style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Rawst.png|30px]] [[Rawst]] || [[File:Rawst.png|30px]] [[Rawst]] |}
{| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Optimized Planting Formation |- | style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Rawst.png|30px]] [[Rawst]] || style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Rawst.png|30px]] [[Rawst]] |- | [[File:Rawst.png|30px]] [[Rawst]] || [[File:Rawst.png|30px]] [[Rawst]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Rawst.png|30px]] [[Rawst]] || [[File:Rawst.png|30px]] [[Rawst]] |- style="height: 50px;" | style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | |- | style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Rawst.png|30px]] [[Rawst]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Rawst.png|30px]] [[Rawst]] |- | [[File:Rawst.png|30px]] [[Rawst]] || [[File:Rawst.png|30px]] [[Rawst]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Rawst.png|30px]] [[Rawst]] || [[File:Rawst.png|30px]] [[Rawst]] |}
==Uses== ===Mutations===
Aguav berries can be used to mutate the following berries.
{| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" |- ! Used In !! With |- | [[File:Hondew.png|20px]] [[Hondew]] || [[File:Figy.png|20px]] [[Figy]]
[[File:Wiki.png|20px]] [[Wiki]] |- | [[File:Grepa.png|20px]] [[Grepa]] || [[File:Figy.png|20px]] [[Figy]] |- | [[File:Rabuta.png|20px]] [[Rabuta]] || [[File:Aspear.png|20px]] [[Aspear]] |- | [[File:Rindo.png|20px]] [[Rindo]] || [[File:Cheri.png|20px]] [[Cheri]]
OR
[[File:Figy.png|20px]] [[Figy]] |- | [[File:Coba.png|20px]] [[Coba]] || [[File:Chesto.png|20px]] [[Chesto]]
OR
[[File:Wiki.png|20px]] [[Wiki]] |- |}
==Acquisition== ===Dungeons=== {{Loot/head‎|Berries}} {{LootItem|Radio Tower|Epic}} {{LootItem|Flower Paradise|Common}} {{LootItem|Chargestone Cave|Common}} {{LootItem|Pokémon Village|Common}} |} |}

revision.comment: Created page with "'''Guaya (Aguav)''' es un tipo de [[Berries|baya]] que puede ser plantada en la [[Farm|granja]]. revision.text:
{{Infobox Berry |name = #18 Guaya (Aguav) |image = [[File:Aguav.png]] |caption = La parte cercana al tallo es un poco amarga. Su delicada flor no necesita mucha luz. |growtime = 5m 50s |harvest = 17 bayas |replant = 30% |mutation = 0.6% |points = 55 |flavor =
*0 picante *0 seco *0 dulce *15 amargo *0 ácido }}
'''Aguav''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding an empty plot with at least 25, but no more than 80 points of bitter and less than 5 points of all other flavours. The [[Rawst]] berry must be unlocked to obtain this berry.
== Growth Tables == === Growth Stages === {| class="wikitable" | style = "image-rendering: pixelated" ! !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 40 secs || 2 mins 50 secs || 3 mins 40 secs || 5 mins 50 secs - 11 mins 40 secs |- ! Animation |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:AguavTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:AguavTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:AguavTreeBerry.png|50px]] |}
=== Ripening Time with Modifiers === {| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" ! Modifier !! Ripe-Wither Time |- ! None | 5 mins 50 secs -
11 mins 40 secs |- ! Sprayduck | 3 mins 53 secs -
7 mins 47 secs |}
== Flow Chart == [[File:Aguav_Flow_Chart.png|100px]]
== Mutation Strategy == === Possible Planting Formations ===
You can fill your farm in the following way to obtain Aguav berries. Purple squares indicate where mutations can occur.
{| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Base Formation |- style="height: 50px;" | style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Rawst.png|30px]] [[Rawst]] |- style="height: 50px;" | style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Rawst.png|30px]] [[Rawst]] || [[File:Rawst.png|30px]] [[Rawst]] |}
